title: Out of the shadows: gender-based violence prevention in emergencies (IFRC - International Federation of Red ...
text: ( Source : IFRC - International Federation of Red Cross and Red Crescent Societies ) By Kate Roux, IFRC In March 2015 , officials from Guinea and Liberia discovered that the Ebola epidemic in West Africa had exacerbated violence against women
